scripts.serve: concurrently "cd ../client && npm run build && cp -r ./dist/. ../server/public" "sleep 10 && tsc --watch" "sleep 15 && nodemon ./tmp/server.js "
scripts.build: tsc --outDir build/server && cp package.json package-lock.json build && cd ../client && npm run build && cp -r ./dist/. ../server/build/public
